description: NaI Probes. Health Canada has a requirement for the supply of NaI Probes and Multichannel Analysers.
full_summary:
**PR6403 HT235-225451 NaI Probes Request for Proposal**
### Reference Number: WS4013768629
### Solicitation Number: WS4013768629
#### Publication Date: June 12, 2023
#### Tender Closing Date: June 27, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST

**Updates**:
The original tender closing time was disregarded. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by June 27, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST. Late bids will be declared non-responsive.

**Request Summary**:
The Department of Health is soliciting bids for the supply of NaI Probes and Multichannel Analysers. These items will be delivered to Ottawa, ON, on or before March 31, 2024.

**Key Requirements**:
The successful bidder must meet the mandatory requirements detailed in Annex A – Requirements of the Request for Proposal.

**Post-Award Services**:
The winning bidder may request a debriefing on the procurement process within 15 working days of receiving the results.

**Procurement Details**:
This is a Request for Proposal (RFP) under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). The procurement is competitive, open, and bids must be submitted in accordance with the RFP document. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers.

**Additional Information**:
* The procurement is for laboratory and scientific equipment (UNSPC 41100000).
* Documents may be submitted in either English or French.
* The PSPC office provides procurement services in both official languages.
* The contracting authority is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (SPAC/PSPC).

**End User Information**:
* The end user for this procurement is the Department of Health (HC/Systeme de soutien Canadien).
* The contact person is Cristian Ardila (SPAC/PSPC), whose email address is cristian.ardila@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca. The contact person is available via email.

**Submission Details**:
* Bidders may request a copy of the RFP document from Cristian Ardila by email.
* The submission deadline is June 27, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST.
* Late bids will be declared non-responsive and will not be considered. Please refer to the Ariba Discovery posting for additional information regarding the submission process.  [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16555980?ext
